title: Namaste Spiritual Healing
author: Namaste Spiritual Healing
description: "I am so grateful for this gift of being an Energy Healer and for the relief and spiritual growth provided to my clients."
cleaned_text: Welcome "I am so grateful for this gift of being an Energy Healer and for the relief and spiritual growth provided to my clients." "I am so grateful for this gift of being an Energy Healer and for the relief and spiritual growth provided to my clients." "Michelle is one of those healers who allows herself to surrender to the Absolute for the greater good of others. She also allows Spirit to burn away her human resistance, fear and residual identity wound. In this way, her life is being lived with more joy and the fruit of her healing comes forth through the lives of others. This is what she is doing with this precious life of hers. The authentic healers of our time know they must heal in order to heal others. She is an authentic healer." - Vickie Spray Spiritual Counselor/ Author/Healer Feel Free to Text/Call or Email to schedule or if you have any questions Tallahassee, FL 32301, US By Appointment Only This website uses cookies. By continuing to use this site, you accept our use of cookies.
